Frequently Asked Questions
  • Who are you?
    We are a team working for InverseSoft based in Pune.
  • Is your data is Official?
    Our Data is not official but its based on reports updated via various media outlets throughout the country.
  • How often you update data?
    We have linked this dashboard to LIVE socket server so as soon as data is added to our database its instantly updated on page.
  • Can I work with you?
    Yes you can, email us at livecovid19org@gmail.com, If you are a developer join us at GitHub Link at Footer.
  • Is your data 100% Accurate?
    Our data is pulled from various API's and Media outlets as well us reporters across the nation. Always verify data with MoHFW
